WorkItem.Description:
I checked a few quest rewards and none seem to be flagged as "unique".
 
For example : http://www.wowhead.com/item=65804/talisman-of-sinister-order
 
You should automatically flag all trinkets and rings obtained from quests as "unique" even if it's not written in the tooltip.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Items] Flag Quest rewards as Unique

Comments.Message:
Unfortunetly, this is not a Rawr issue but a Wowhead issue. We only supply what is given to us by wowhead and currently they do not mark this as a unique item. if you want, I would suggest making a ticket on their website. as for a temporary fix, go

Options -> Edit Item -> search Talisman of Sinister Order -> edit -> check the unique check box.

Previously, we specifically did not do this, because there were repeatable quests that rewarded rings/trinkets. I'm not sure if any of those situations are relevant anymore though, so perhaps we should revisit this.

Well even if there is still any such case the majority of them are one time only quests so the exception should be to uncheck unique if that happens and have unique as default to minimize need for user intervention.
